forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 19F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 27F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers in the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early with a steadier snow developing late in the day. High around 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 70%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Rain and snow showers in the evening. A few rain showers late. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening will become intermittent in the overnight hours. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High near 40F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow showers early changing to mainly rain showers in the afternoon. High 3C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow showers. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by noontime. Temps nearly steady in the low to mid 30s. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow showers developing after midnight. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow showers developing after midnight. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low around 25F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.
